options.title: -H
options.description:
If the -R option is also specified, symbolic links
      on the command line are followed. Symbolic links encountered in the tree
      traversal are not followed.

options.title: -h
options.description:
Treat symbolic links like other files: modify links instead of following
      them. The -h and -R
      options are mutually exclusive.

options.title: -L
options.description:
If the -R option is also specified, all symbolic
      links are followed.

options.title: -P
options.description:
If the -R option is also specified, no symbolic
      links are followed.

options.title: -R
options.description:
Recurse. Where file is a directory, change the flags
      of the directory and all the files and directories in the file hierarchy
      below it.
